subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Sacramento Kings introduced Eric Musselman yesterday as their new coach, the first hired by Joe and Gavin Maloof since they bought the team in 1999. The 41-year-old Musselman coached Golden State from 2002-4.
snippet: The Sacramento Kings introduced Eric Musselman yesterday as their new coach, the first hired by Joe and Gavin Maloof since they bought the team in 1999. The 41-year-old Musselman coached Golden State from 2002-4.
